reviews.text:
What an amazing flavor and taste that reminds the himalayas. The two dishes listed are outstanding and can't mention much.
Pork Sekuwa, Noodle Soup and...
My wife and I visited a few weeks ago. Had momos, vegetable pakoras, and pork sekuwa. By far the best Nepali food I've ever had! Very clean on the inside...
Khaja Ghar has been open for a month and a half, and according to the owner has had a rough time getting the unit up to speed. When I came in for lunch...
